Choice.Desc: Oh Hey. I woulda thought you'd be hanging out in the library.

Option.Desc: I didn't know you'd get in so much trouble to be honest

Choice.Desc: Well, it's MY MOM. THE PRINCIPAL. What did you expect?

Option.Desc: I'm sorry that things had to happen like that
I didn't mean for things to go this. Just a slap on the wrist, you know?
Oh...I didn't think you'd come to school today...
